name: LeptospirosisTestsForLeptospiraAntibodyQuantitativeByAgglutination
title: Leptospirosis (Tests for Leptospira Antibody [Quantitative] by Agglutination)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Leptospira antibody (quantitative results).),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Leptospira antibody by agglutination;

LOINC search: leptospira Ab agglutination Qn),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
